alert.note: Alert for Klamath Basin (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 18 at 11:49AM PDT until April 19 at 5:00AM PDT by NWS Medford
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM PDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph. * WHERE...In California, Northeast Siskiyou and Northwest Modoc Counties. In Oregon, Klamath Basin. This includes Klamath Falls, Merrill, Malin, and Tulelake. * WHEN...Until 5 AM PDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
